thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1861
thread.title: Stacey

author: Stacey
title: Stacey
text: Flight hub is great sends you reminder and updates of the prices for your flights and changes. You have to be careful and check the dates. It maybe cheap but it may make you late for work or miss your start date of convention. I almost booked two flight to Salt Lake City but they were not for the dates I asked. I did finally find a fairly cheap flight and booked it making sure I declined the insurance. I checked the price the dates fill in all the boxes correctly but after I put in my credit card and did the check out the price of the flight had changed by $80. I phoned the office to ask what had happened they said I hadn t declined the insurance I informed him that yes I did and I wanted the origanal price I should of paid. He made the changes but what I didn t like is that it would take 2 to 10 days to get it credited to my credit card. Is it a mistake or is someone making a killing on short term investment with other people's money. Just saying. Stacey
